content: Hoho?
A cozy place to live.
Wonderful! Here, have some more!
So <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> likes this style... hohoho!
Ah, you drank some weird tea? No wonder you're restless.
To connect your story with others and start anew!
The planet, too, will take root in its own time, and bloom anew...
I hope the glow from my tail didn't bother you.
Buckle up! Things'll get bumpy! I'm gonna hit the gas!
So, not a bad ride through the Maelstrom, right?
Captain Mo! Welcome back!
Hoho...
What is that?! It's glowing!
an official name—<color=#97c344>{homestar}</color>!
Here, a new chapter begins, different from before.
And because of it, you are in my dream, and I'm in yours
Is that even possible?!
Each planet has its own special kind of spectacular!
Hi, I'm Frostia.
Hey neighbors!
Hoho, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, let's chat later about the tea preparations.
Unbelievable...
<size=30>I-If you're driving, I think I'll pass...</size>
We gotta stay with it to protect it from the Maelstrom.
Here's the new arrival!
Through the Starsea — full speed ahead! Hold on, we're turnin'!
Safe and sound!
Hoho... Thank you for setting up the Camp.
<color=#8AAB4B>Glenn</color> here, I'm a trainee coordinator. Nice to meet you...
You're probably wondering how to start life here.
Not really...
It tastes like drinking a marigold-colored tree!
I only came back to get you after I saw the Maelstrom disappear.
A place to sip afternoon tea and let my mind wander...
Don't worry! I won't hit so much as a feather... Ah!
Hello, everyone! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color>, you have been through a lot to get here!
It's all right. Let's have some tea?
Could it be...?! The Maelstrom is back?!!
You can choose to live freely, all on your own.
Broadcast: But residents, please remember to stay safe while traveling!
See, here they come.
Pardon me.
You're gonna break it!
Hoho~ Then <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color>, Glenn, and Sani will tidy up the Camp.
These fluctuations...
The tea is ready too! Perfect timing to celebrate our Astralink getting
We're making a super-sized Ecoglobe, of course!
Wow, a new friend!
Whoo-oo~! My friend, we meet again!
Hold on tight! We're coming in to land!
So, let's connect with everything, starting now...
To help with your fresh start, we're moving in too.
Jump! I'll catch you!
Did you see that blue smoke just now?
Here I come!
I'm Glenn, welcome!
Hoho! One day, we'll come back to the Starsea and take our time to explore it properly.
Now, stop sticking your head out of the car window. We're almost there!
As day yields to night and the seasons pass, mountains shift, rivers flow... All things connect, and life takes root.
Broadcast: The Lumia in the skyline of Loomi District today is peaceful and stable.
That seagull! What's it doing to my windshield?!
That color is so intense, uh...
Can branches be brewed into tasty tea?!
I've heard Mr. Mobai's tea-making skills are legendary, and I finally get to taste it!
I really want to visit the "Little Bubble World"...
Light-years away, deep in the cosmos
Excitement first—Wait, I mean—Safety first.
You can't do that! Give it back!
What? I'm just pressing buttons like you did!
This coordinate's way off to the southeast~
Mors mentioned that "the ground is glowing."
...How did you figure that out?!
Looks like good fortune will smile upon us.
Welcome to your new home! I'm Mobai, here with freshly brewed tea to celebrate this special arrival.
But for now, slumber beckons Oumuamua... We can only meet beyond the veil of sleep.
I don't care. I'm setting off!
Mo need to rush, just wait a little longer...
So we are neighbors now.
There must be some secret hidden here, and I'm going to figure it out...
But, be it your state of mind, or the skyline there
Must've been quite the journey! Wanna... freshen up a bit first?
<style=NpcName>Oumuamua</style> has sensed the sprouting of the Astral Arbor...
I'm a scholar of mysticism at Revelare Academia.
What a shame. I beg your pardon.
I'm Mobai, here with tea to welcome you to your new home
I'm heading out to restock tomorrow, and I'm going to shout our Astralink's name loud and clear!
Shh, this is why you're here—to begin.
Loomi Mart!
These tundra planets are FREE-ZING! Feel like my ears are turning to icicles! Hit the gas!
It can be a bit willful sometimes~
Hoho~ Sani, slow down. Don't hit the seagulls or fish!
Tee-hee!
Hoho...
He's probably here. Let's go check it out!
What kind of mischief did you get up to up there~?
Woah! A fish just flew right over our car!
Our Lumia Shuttle is entering the <color=#8AAB4B>Maelstrom Zone</color>! <size=30>Cool</size>!
We've reached the Bubble World on our Astralink! Huh? There's so much fog...
We're passing by some oceanic planets... I wonder, do you think coconut would make a nice tea blend, hoho?
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, look! What's with all the seagulls...
And with that, the first pot of tea for our Astralink is ready.
It's the "Little Bubble World"!
Hmm? A neighbor off to a new life with us?
I hope we'll find...
You all look like you've been spat out of a black hole.
Unbelievable... The mist created by the Maelstrom has completely cleared!
How about we call our Astralink <color=#97c344>{homestar}</color>?
Hi there~! I'm Esassani from Loomi Co.!
Everyone else's Neo Astralink is packed and they've already set off, and we only have one person?!
But right now, what I really want is to find a...
Should we fix ourselves up before getting off?
Oh come' on! It's not like I'm running a truck over it!
Swoosh~! I love that name!
Tee-hee~ If Glenn helps me fix up the Camp tomorrow, I'll drive you up there~!
Finally, the world we're connected to... has grown!
But, looks like it helped you build more "connections."
being with friends makes everything feel different...
I know it won't be long before I see you again, whoo-oo~!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, congrats on your new ride!
Broadcast: On every street, we can witness the grand departure of the Neo Astralink traffic.
Hohoho!
Hoho...
Please, help yourself.
We're getting close to the Maelstrom... Something's in the mist, look!
Captain Mo must have his reasons for this brew... ugh.
Loomi Co. has sent you a special gift!
The tea leaves are floating upright...
Thanks, Captain Mo!
We've reached the other side of the Bubble World.
Quick, come here! This thing is flying off!
Shaking trees... does that count?
...Truly legendary...ugh.
For example, the ever-mysterious River of Stars...
Let's get out of here, quick!
I taste a hint of sea... Did he add Companion Grass?!
That's the meaning of "connection."
We're bringing the Bubble World back... What's it for?
Mobai!
Captain — eh! ...Ah! ...Ugh!
Brace for thermal blasts! These planets are known for their fierce sandstorms~!
Molten lava-spitting volcanoes, hoho!
I wonder what kind of Bubble World we'll end up in?
This cozy Bubble World is brimming with life!
Wow! Great job, Sani!
It's nice out here. Let's talk it over a nice cup of tea
All those strange ingredients... actually taste great!
Hoho! It's Mors' Planette. He has arrived.
Sparking the appearance of a variety of landscapes and ecosystems.
<style=Highlight>Luca</style> is the vitality of all things.
The Starsea Spirit, known as "Oumuamua," journeys to each world
Ready to welcome you, awaiting your call...
With it, we shall begin... nurturing the planet!
Once the Lucaseed is connected to the planet
As the Starsea entwines, seeds begin to sprout, and you nurture a planet into being...
Hoho, now, please plant the <style=Highlight>Lucaseed</style>!
A wondrous adventure, uniquely yours, is set to begin.
An endless flow of Luca will nourish its growth
Now approaching the Loomi Co. Planet Registry
Lies the Starsea, dotted with countless planets.
We look forward to meeting you!
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, please accept this <style=Highlight>Lucaseed</style>.
Warp speed, at the ready!
Hey~! Oumuamua!
Huh? Is the planet shaking?
Whoa! The hill's taller now!
Let's go!
Is the tree growing bubbles?
I can hear the sea!
Wowww!
Look! It's Oumuamua!
Hoho~ The tree's vitality is nourishing the planet's growth.
